Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurs in cases that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that are followed by a resubmission ('Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurring after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' appears more than once in the same trace
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in variants that do not include any approval step by PRE_APPROVER, ADMINISTRATION, or BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' relative to the total number of rejection activities (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that occur in traces without a prior 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events associated with declaration amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and ending with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' without subsequent resubmission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' does not happen

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in the entire event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' directly follows 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that originate from departments included only in the 2018 data collection (i.e., outside the original two departments)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in comparison to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', given the goal to reduce rejections by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that appear in traces lacking any involvement of a PRE_APPROVER role
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of unique case identifiers (declaration numbers) associated with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that are part of looping behavior (i.e., followed later in the same trace by another 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of successful completions ('Payment Handled') after a 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' versus after a 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurring in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases
